title: Cool

author: Richard Mordew
comment: I had to delete all my reviews before they would give me my refund, yet still not had my refund for this app. Just got this from the developer "We really don't care about your $2 lol. Take a look at the attached picture and tell me if it looks correct. Both refunds were done at the same time.  We don't send the confirmation emails, Google does. Maybe it's in your spam folder, did you even bother checking your credit card statement? That's OK they can look at my account, I give 100% accurate reviews always.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Richard we have spoken about this before.  Leaving false reviews in order to get your money back is unnecessary. I believe this is your 5th review.  We have given you a refund days ago.  To be honest we offer refunds on all our apps, always have.  You just have to ask.  We have taken the liberty to have Google review your account.  Thanks!

title: Mangla Media

author: Jim Thibault
comment: I want a watch face that has a black background and white text in both active and ambient mode but this watch face insists on giving you a bright background in active mode....... This mean extra battery drain and even more important I do not like bright backgrounds.   This is the way it is the ambient mode background is black, the text is the same colour of the background with the screen on. This is not want I want..... but at least they offered to give me a refund (which I refused)

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for the update Jim.  We are looking at incorporating your ideas into future watch faces.

author: Jeff Menard
comment: I installed this app, started using the watch face immediately.  Works perfectly, gorgeous and it really stands out.  I'm going to get as many watch faced as I can and switch back and forth as it feels like a new watch every time.  Switching back and forth is seemless.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for the wonderful review Jeff!

title: Nice looking watch face but horrible color controls

author: Nathan K.
comment: ... my Nexus 6 keeps telling about 3 times a day that the watch face has crashed (on my LG Urbane). There is no way to choose weather source / provider and temps are not very accurate.  I have sent several crash reports to dev hoping that this will be fixed soon.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Thanks for sending those reports Nathan.  It's just the kind of thing that helps us find the solution.  While the programmers read the reports I'm fairly certain that I could solve most of your issues if not all of them.  Email us at Forzaonestudios@gmail.com    Thanks!

title: Gorgeous watch, hamstrung...

author: Trevor Whiteway
comment: Very disappointed with app. Changes settings constantly by itself. Does not stay on long enough.

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi Trevor.  Interactivity allows you to tap the screen which scrolls your saved colours.  The on/off for interactivity is in the setting of the app.  None of the developers have control over how long your watch stays on, that depends on the hardware of your watch, it has nothing to do with us.  Any other questions?  Forzaonestuidos@gmail.com
